definition: to make, cause to be or to become
details:
verb
- to make, cause to be or to become
= example: to make, cause to be or to become
= synonyms: make
- to create or manufacture a man-made product
= synonyms: make
- to create by artistic means
= example: to create by artistic means
= synonyms: make
- to pursue a creative activity
= example: to pursue a creative activity
- to bring into existence
= example: to bring into existence
= synonyms: generate
- to invest with a new title, office, or rank
